com.teamalasca.computer.interfaces

Interface CoreManagementI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Computer, CoreManagementConnector, CoreManagementInboundPort, CoreManagementOutboundPort

    public interface CoreManagementI
    The interface CoreManagementI defines the services offered by Computer components.
    Author:
    Clément George, Mohamed Amine Corchi, Victor Nea
